Key Match Events: Pete Crow-Armstrong made three incredible catches in center field, including a game-ending home run robbery of Max Muncy.
Tommy Edman hit two solo home runs.
Max Muncy hit a solo home run.
The Cubs staged a rally in the 8th inning, capitalizing on Dodgers' defensive errors.
Seiya Suzuki ripped an RBI single to center.
Nico Hoerner added an RBI double.
Pete Crow-Armstrong had an RBI groundout.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cubs have to be thrilled with Pete Crow-Armstrong's development over the last two months.
If Pete Crow-Armstrong keeps this pace up, maybe Chicago can even make things interesting here in the last three weeks of 2024.
